snippet: No matter where the Edmonton Oilers travel, captain Connor McDavid is confronted by the same questions and comparisons to the opposing team's star....
lead_paragraph: No matter where the Edmonton Oilers travel, captain Connor McDavid is confronted by the same questions and comparisons to the opposing team's star.

headline.main: Marquee Rivals: From Crosby and Ovechkin to McDavid and Who?
